Package com.playground.playground.modelling

Class NeuralNetBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.playground.playground.modelling.NeuralNetBuilder
  • public class NeuralNetBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    The NeuralNetBuilder class helps create the NeuralNet class in the builder design.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      NeuralNetBuilder()  

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      NeuralNetBuilder activation​(org.nd4j.linalg.activations.Activation activation)
      Set activation function for all except the output layer, defaults to ReLU.
      NeuralNet buildNeuralNet()
      Create the NeuralNet class object in accordance to other methods called or defaults.
      NeuralNetBuilder inputs​(int inputs)
      Set the number of inputs, defaults to 2.
      NeuralNetBuilder layers​(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> layers)
      A list of numbers showing the number of nodes ine ach layer, excluding the last layer but including the first layer in this list, defaults to [2,4,2].
      NeuralNetBuilder learningRate​(double learningRate)
      Set learning rate, defaults to 1e-3.
      NeuralNetBuilder lossFunction​(org.nd4j.linalg.lossfunctions.LossFunctions.LossFunction lossFunction)
      Set loss function, defaults to negative log likelihood.
      NeuralNetBuilder nOut​(int nOut)
      Set the number of outputs, defaults to 2.
      NeuralNetBuilder optimizationAlgorithm​(org.deeplearning4j.nn.api.OptimizationAlgorithm optimizationAlgorithm)
      Set the optimization algorithm, defaults to SGD.
      NeuralNetBuilder optimizer​(org.deeplearning4j.nn.conf.Updater optimizer)
      Set the optimizer, defaults to Adam.
      NeuralNetBuilder regularization​(boolean regularization)
      Should you use regularization?, defaults to true.
      NeuralNetBuilder regularizationFactor​(double regularizationFactor)
      Set the regularization factor, defaults to 5e-4.
      NeuralNetBuilder regularizationType​(java.lang.String regularizationType)
      Set regularization type, either one of "l1" or "l2", defaults to "l2".
      NeuralNetBuilder seed​(int seed)
      Set seed for the experiments, defaults to 123 (ideally choose 3047).
      NeuralNetBuilder weightInit​(org.deeplearning4j.nn.weights.WeightInit weightInit)
      Set weight initialization startegy, defaults to Xavier.
